case.title: FELLOW STONER SEEKED - 19
case.text:
Hi there... I'm a 19 year old, fairly attractive,well educated girl.. looking for a fun guy to have a smoke and chill with- maybe more if the attractions there! Can be just for one night.. or a regular thing! I'm very easy going, good company !
Message with your star sign as header so i know your legit. Look forward to hearing from you :) x
